name: Chaowen Guan
content: Expert Profile: Chaowen Guan | Research Directory Chaowen Guan Asst Professor Rhodes Hall CEAS - Computer Science - 0030 513-556-2988EmailDownload V-Card I am an assistant professor in the department of computer science of UC. Prior to UC, I obtained my Ph.D. in computer science and engineering from University at Buffalo, and then became a postdoc at the Pennsylvania State University in the theory CS group working with prof Sean Hallgren. You can find more details in my website: https://chaoweng.github.io/Ph.D. : the State University of New York at Buffalo 2020 (Computer Science and Engineering) I am interested in theoretical computer science in general. Until recently, I have been working on topics in security, cryptography, computational complexity, quantum algorithms and quantum machine learning.
